// query-dsl/multi-match-query.asciidoc:33

[source, php]
----
$params = [
    'body' => [
        'query' => [
            'multi_match' => [
                'query' => 'Will Smith',
                'fields' => [
                    'title',
                    '*_name',
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ],
];
$response = $client->search($params);
----
